Ammyy Admin is a user-friendly and cost-free remote desktop sharing solution that enables you to operate a remote desktop effortlessly, from practically any location around the world. It is a perfect tool for remote access to PCs and servers, and for remote support or teaching and learning at a distance.

## Features

### High-speed performance

One of the most significant advantages of Ammyy Admin is its high-speed performance, thanks to its optimized data transfer algorithms. With LAN or broadband Internet, Ammyy Admin performs very fast, with transfer rates of up to 400kb per second.

### Secure remote access

Ammyy Admin utilizes advanced encryption algorithms that ensure secure data transfer between the remote PC and the hosting device. All data transfer is heavily encrypted, making it almost impossible for hackers to breach.

### No installation required

Another key feature of Ammyy Admin is that it requires no installation on either the host or remote PC. You only need to download the Ammyy Admin executable and run it on both devices in order to establish remote desktop access.

### Voice chat and file sharing

Ammyy Admin has additional communication features such as voice chat, file transfer, and text chat that together enhance the user experience, making it easier to interact with remote PCs directly.

## How does it work?

To use Ammyy Admin, a special .exe file is downloaded from the official website and opened on both the host and remote PCs. After opening the .exe file, a unique 9-digit ID is displayed, which the remote user must enter in order to connect to the host PC. With Ammyy Admin, you can work with remote desktops that are situated behind firewalls, without requiring any network configuration at all.

## Conclusion

Ammyy Admin is an excellent remote desktop sharing solution that provides secure and fast access to remote PCs located anywhere in the world without the need for complicated setup or installation. With its encryption algorithms, ease-of-use, and additional communication tools, Ammyy Admin is the perfect tool for remote desktop sharing purposes.
